input: Create a batch request to get mandates with creditor reference 'CR5678' and signed in 'Hamburg'.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /DirectDebitMandates?$filter=CreditorReferenceID eq 'CR5678' and SignatureCityName eq 'Hamburg' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
